sen.j: 葛野大路（かどのおおじ）は、京都府京都市の主要な南北の通りの一つ。
sen.e: The Kadonoji-dori Street is one of the major north-south running streets of Kyoto City.
The Kadonoji-dori Street is one of the major streets running north-south in Kyoto City.
The Kadonooji-dori Street is one of the major streets running north-south in Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.
sen.cmt: スペルを修正 Kyoto Prefecture補足

sen.j: 平安京の西京極大路にあたると言われるが、やや東側にずれている。
sen.e: Although it is said to correspond to the Nishikyogoku-oji of Heiankyo, it lies slightly to the east.
Although it is said to correspond to Nishikyogoku-oji of Heiankyo, it lies slightly to the east.
Although it is said to correspond to Nishikyogoku-oji of Heiankyo, it lies slightly to the east.
The north end is Taishimichi (the road where Prince Shotoku took).
The north end is Taishimichi (the road where Prince Shotoku took).
The north end is Taishimichi (the road where Prince Shotoku took).

sen.j: 南は国道171号の久世橋東詰。
sen.e: The south end is Kuzebashi Higashizum of Nation Highway Route No. 171.
The south end is Kuzebashi Higashizum of National Highway Route No. 171.
The south end is Kuzebashi Higashizume of National Highway Route No. 171.

sen.j: しかし部分的にしか開業しておらず、長らく四条通から御池通までは未開通のままであった。
sen.e: It took long time for the section between the Shijo-dori Street and the Oike-dori Street to open and the street has not completely opened.
It took a long time for the section between Shijo-dori Street and Oike-dori Street to open, and in fact the street was never completely opened.
It took a long time for the section between Shijo-dori Street and Oike-dori Street to open, and in fact the street was never completely opened.

sen.j: 2004年4月に四条通 - 三条通が開通し、2005年3月に三条通 - 御池通が開通した。
sen.e: In April 2004, the section between the Shijo-dori Street and the Sanjo-dori Street opened, and in 2005, the section between the Sanjo-dori Street and the Oike-dori Street section opened.
In April 2004, the section between Shijo-dori Street and Sanjo-dori Street opened, and in 2005, the section between Sanjo-dori Street and Oike-dori Street section opened.
In April 2004, the section between Shijo-dori Street and Sanjo-dori Street opened, and in March 2005, the section between Sanjo-dori Street and Oike-dori Street section opened.

sen.j: 西側に平行する天神川通（国道162号）のバイパス道路としての役割も担っており、北は丸太町通までの延伸が計画されている。
sen.e: It serves as a bypass of the Tenjingawa-dori Street (National Highway route No. 162), which parallels west of it, and an extension to Marutamachi-dori Street in the north is being planed..
It serves as a bypass for Tenjingawa-dori Street (National Highway route No. 162), which runs parallel to it on its west, while an extension to Marutamachi-dori Street in the north is being planed..
It serves as a bypass for Tenjingawa-dori Street (National Highway route No. 162), which runs parallel to it on its west, while an extension to Marutamachi-dori Street in the north is being planed.

sen.j: 葛野大路御池交差点は、京都市営地下鉄東西線太秦天神川駅付近となり、右京区総合庁舎も同駅真上に新しく移転した。
sen.e: Kadonoji-oike Crossing is near Uzumasa-tenjingawa Station of Tozai Line, Kyoto City Subway Line, above which the general buildings of Ukyo Ward Office has been recently built and relocated.
Kadonoji-oike Crossing is near Uzumasa-tenjingawa Station of Tozai Line, Kyoto City Subway Line, above which the general buildings of Ukyo Ward Office have been recently built and relocated.
Kadonooji-oike Crossing is near Uzumasa-tenjingawa Station of Tozai Line, Kyoto City Subway Line, above which the general buildings of Ukyo Ward Office have been recently built and relocated.

sen.j: 交差する道路などの特記がないものは市町村道。
sen.e: Roads unless specified are operated by local municipalities.
Roads unless specified are operated by local municipalities.
Roads unless specified are operated by local municipalities.
